citations.narrative:
In the primary enclosure housing an adult, female Patagonian cavy and three baby goats, there is broken chicken wire
fastened to a side of one fence. The wire has sharp points and protrudes inward, where the animals could easily come
into contact with it.
Sharp points pose an injury hazard for the animals. All enclosures must be constructed and maintained in good repair to
protect the animals from injury.
TO BE CORRECTED BY MARCH 7, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.125(a)  Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
In the primary enclosure housing an adult, female Patagonian cavy and three baby goats, there is broken chicken wire 
fastened to a side of one fence.  The wire has sharp points and protrudes inward, where the animals could easily come 
into contact with it.   
 
Sharp points pose an injury hazard for the animals. All enclosures must be constructed and maintained in good repair to 
protect the animals from injury.  
 
TO BE CORRECTED BY MARCH 7, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
